details.message: Advance Warning - Christmas Markets
details.template: Christmas Markets in Manchester City Centre.
details.free-text: Markets at Albert Square, Brazennose St, Exchange St, Exchange Square, King St, Market St, New Cathedral St and St Ann's Square. Opening times are 10:00 to 19:30 (20:00 in December) except Albert Square that stays open until 21:00. Expect extra traffic.From 14th November to 22:00 on 21st December.
